ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( copado__Promote_Change__c, copado__Promote_and_Deploy__c ), NOT(ISBLANK(copado__Environment__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(copado__Base_Branch__c)), copado__Environment__c == copado__Base_Branch__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: My Rule: You can not move this user story passed its base branch
